001package io.cyborgcode.roa.ui.components.table.registry;
002
003import io.cyborgcode.roa.ui.components.base.ComponentType;
004import io.cyborgcode.roa.ui.components.table.filters.TableFilter;
005import io.cyborgcode.roa.ui.components.table.insertion.TableInsertion;
006import java.util.Map;
007import java.util.concurrent.ConcurrentHashMap;
008
009/**
010 * Registry for managing table-related services.
011 *
012 * <p>This class provides a centralized registry for storing and retrieving
013 * {@link TableInsertion} and {@link TableFilter} services based on their
014 * associated {@link ComponentType}. It ensures efficient lookups and
015 * dynamic service assignment for table operations.
016 *
017 * <p>Used in {@code TableImpl} and {@code TableServiceImpl} to manage
018 * cell insertion and filtering mechanisms.
019 *
020 * @author Cyborg Code Syndicate üíçüë®üíª
021 */
022public class TableServiceRegistry {
023
024   /**
025    * Stores registered {@link TableInsertion} services mapped to their component types.
026    */
027   private final Map<Class<? extends ComponentType>, TableInsertion> tableInsertionRegistry = new ConcurrentHashMap<>();
028
029   /**
030    * Stores registered {@link TableFilter} services mapped to their component types.
031    */
032   private final Map<Class<? extends ComponentType>, TableFilter> tableFilterRegistry = new ConcurrentHashMap<>();
033
034   /**
035    * Registers a {@link TableInsertion} service for a specific {@link ComponentType}.
036    *
037    * @param type    The component type for which the service is registered.
038    * @param service The {@link TableInsertion} implementation to be registered.
039    */
040   public void registerService(Class<? extends ComponentType> type, TableInsertion service) {
041      tableInsertionRegistry.put(type, service);
042   }
043
044   /**
045    * Registers a {@link TableFilter} service for a specific {@link ComponentType}.
046    *
047    * @param type    The component type for which the service is registered.
048    * @param service The {@link TableFilter} implementation to be registered.
049    */
050   public void registerService(Class<? extends ComponentType> type, TableFilter service) {
051      tableFilterRegistry.put(type, service);
052   }
053
054   /**
055    * Retrieves the registered {@link TableInsertion} service for the specified component type.
056    *
057    * @param type The component type associated with the service.
058    * @return The corresponding {@link TableInsertion} service, or {@code null} if not registered.
059    */
060   public TableInsertion getTableService(Class<? extends ComponentType> type) {
061      return tableInsertionRegistry.get(type);
062   }
063
064   /**
065    * Retrieves the registered {@link TableFilter} service for the specified component type.
066    *
067    * @param type The component type associated with the service.
068    * @return The corresponding {@link TableFilter} service, or {@code null} if not registered.
069    */
070   public TableFilter getFilterService(Class<? extends ComponentType> type) {
071      return tableFilterRegistry.get(type);
072   }
073
074}
